event.name: Virtual Speaker Series: Chris Hope
event.shortDescription: Media Design Virtual Speaker Series eith Chris Hope, Executive Director & Co-Founder of the Loop Lab

description.html: Chris Hope is the founder of the Loop Lab and joins us to discuss the lab’s origins and the importance of training young adults of color to enter the media arts field. He touches on the 3 pillars of the lab(Employment, Education, & Entrepreneurship) and what it means to those in the program to be able to tell their own stories. Lastly, he discusses how they’ve pivoted in the pandemic and what the organization’s next steps are.
